## Address.toString() method

Converts the Address to a string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toString(base?: import("multiformats/dist/types/src/bases/base").Codec<"base32", "b">): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  base | import("multiformats/dist/types/src/bases/base").Codec&lt;"base32", "b"&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> the base encoding to use |
